casebody.data:
Rich, Respondent, v. Mayer, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. November, 1889.) Appeal from city court, general term.

Argued before Larremore, C. J., and Daly and Van Hoesen, JJ.

M. A. Gearon, for appellant. A. P. Wagner, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs. For former report, see 7 N. Y. Supp. 69.
